summary: During the reign of Elizabeth I, a young man's fervent devotion to the crown and to his sweetheart, a lady-in-waiting, lead him to battle for England's victory over the Spanish Armada in 1588.
cast: Flora Robson|Raymond Massey|Leslie Banks|Laurence Olivier|Vivien Leigh|Morton Selten|Tamara Desni|Lyn Harding|George Thirlwell|Henry Oscar|Robert Rendel|Robert Newton|Donald Calthrop|James Mason|Charles Carson|Howard Douglas|Cecil Mainwaring|Francis De Wolff|Graham Cheswright|A. Corney Grain|Lawrence Hanray|Roy Russell|Evelyn Ankers|Noel Brophy|Beryl de Querton|Pam Downing|Franklin Dyall|Vallejo Gantner|Herbert Lomas|Ralph Truman|Norma Varden
keywords: queen elizabeth i|boat on fire|spanish history|european history|british history
title: Inglaterra en llamas
